text:
From Dr. Seuss Wiki

Cindy Lou Who is a character from the Dr. Seuss books.

Cindy Lou Who, who was no more than two. She first appears in the wonderful Christmas parable "How The Grinch Stole Christmas!". When the Grinch comes down the chimney to steal the house's contents, Cindy Lou is sneaking in for a glass of water. The Grinch slinks in and gets her a glass of water, sends her back to bed, and goes back to his sack.

At the end, when the Grinch is about to carve the Roast Beast, CLW is right at his side to get her portion.
title: Dr. Seuss Wiki
